imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Square logo image based on the uploaded transparent PNG (logo-indian-fitness-unisex-gym.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Add the uploaded new logo (use the transparent PNG upload) as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and standardize it to a square 512Ã—512 PNG for consistent rendering.
Update `frontend/src/config/branding.ts` to point `BRANDING.logo.path` to the new logo asset so the header and footer display the new logo everywhere the branding config is used.
Update `frontend/index.html` favicon `<link rel='icon'>` to use the new logo asset so the browser tab icon matches the new logo.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the app to display a new logo (replace existing logo in the UI).

projectName: Replace app logo with uploaded Indian Fitness logo
